ActSpecial Appointment Regulations, No. 2006-5
PrecisAppointment of the HONOURABLE JOHN C. MAJOR, Q.C., of Calgary, Alberta, to the position of Independent Counsellor to the Prime Minister, to hold office during pleasure for a term beginning on March 24, 2006 and ending on June 1, 2006.
